text: Kevin Darnell Hart (born July 6, 1979) is an American actor and comedian. He is known for his roles in Paper Soldiers, Scary Movie 3, Along Came Polly, Soul Plane, The Wedding Ringer, Think Like a Man, Ride Along, Get Hard, The Secret Life of Pets, Captain Underpants: The First Epic Movie, Jumanji: Welcome to the Jungle and The Upside. He was born on July 6, 1979 in Philadelphia, Pennsylvania. He studied the Community College. Hart has been married to Torrei Hart from 2003 until they divorced in 2011. They had two children. In 2016, he married Eniko Parrish. They have three children. On September 1, 2019, Hart was involved in a serious car crash near Malibu, California. He and the driver suffered "major back injuries" and were taken to hospitals. ==References== ==Other websites== * * Category:1979 births Category:Living people Category:Actors from Philadelphia Category:African- American actors Category:American movie actors Category:American television actors Category:American television personalities Category:American voice actors Category:Comedians from Philadelphia
title: Kevin Hart
